title: How to get permission to use licensed music - Quora

response.answer_text: you have to contact the publisher to request permission. look on the bmi and ascap websites to find the publisher. the right to use the original recording of the song is different from the right to use your own performance of the song. either way, you will need permission and most likely have to pay a licencing fee.
